Author: TheArcane43
Name: Substat Tiers
Description: Gives a detailed table of how your substats work. Includes substat tiering, substat effects, potential tier gains on materia, and estimated damage amounts per 100 potency.
Punchline: Shows how substats tier and what effects you get from them.
Changelog:
Changes from 0.3.0.3:
 - Added support for most instances of synced damage.
